title: Recent News
description: Read news about research at the Gerstner Sloan Kettering Graduate School of Biomedical Sciences.
sitename: Gerstner Sloan Kettering Graduate School of Biomedical Sciences
cleaned_text: Careers in Translational Cancer Research](/news/msk-program-prepares-clinicians-careers-translational-cancer-research) In the past 30 years, major strides have been made in translational medicine — the bridge that shepherds research findings from the lab to clinical practice. Researchers, physicians, and other specialists at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center (MSK) have played a major role in these successes, as they work together with the common goal of using their discoveries to create new treatments for people with cancer.
